module: Module-level comment: The 'Zero_detector' module monitors two 16-bit input signals ('InputL', 'InputR'), triggered by 'in_status', for zero levels. A 'Reset_n' line resets internal signals 'sleep_count' and 'sleep_status' to zero. 'sleep_count', a 10-bit register, increments on concurrent zero inputs and resets otherwise. 'sleep_status', a binary signal, becomes high when 'sleep_count' hits 800, indicating sleep mode, and resets on 'Reset_n' triggering. Unused inputs include 'OutReady' and 'col'.
